participant_1.background:
I have been working on my car at night, trying to fix it without them knowing.
I read up on the history of my city in preparation for a visit from my best friend.
the weather here is very cold , but so beautiful in the spring.
i am an accountant.
i met my birth mother when i was sixteen.

participant_2.background:
I love the feeling of wearing my new sneakers.
i like to live off of the land.
I have never been arrested, but I have had my fair share of close calls.
i have the gene that lets me know when someone s eaten asparagus.
my son is a football player.

content.text: Hey how are you today?
Good thanks! I'm excited for the snow to melt so I can go hiking again!
Oh that's exciting! I wish I could hike more often.
What do you do for fun?
I'm an accountant, so I do a lot of paperwork. But I love to read, go to the movies, and play video games.
Oh cool! I've been meaning to read more. I love the feeling of getting lost in a good book.
Me too! I just read a book about the history of my city. It was really interesting.
Oh that sounds cool! I'm from a small town, so we don't have much history here.
Where are you from?
I'm from a small town in Minnesota.
Oh nice! I've always wanted to visit Minnesota.
You should! It's beautiful in the summer.
I will have to! What do you like to do for fun?
I like to go fishing, hunting, and camping. I also like to play video games and watch movies.
I love to watch movies too! What are some of your favorite movies?
I love action movies and comedies.
Me too! I love the Fast and Furious movies.
Those are great! I also love the Hangover movies.
Those are so funny! I'm glad we have similar interests.
Me too!
